testcase.name: AuthService > signIn > returns repository result unchanged on success
AuthService > signIn > wraps repository errors with application context
AuthService > signIn > preserves error code 'email_not_confirmed' while wrapping message
AuthService > signIn > preserves error code 'invalid_login_credentials' while wrapping message
AuthService > signIn > throws wrapped error safely when repository error has no code
AuthService > signUp > returns repository result unchanged on success
AuthService > signUp > preserves coded repository errors for signUp
AuthService > signUp > wraps unknown signUp errors safely
SupabaseAuthRepository > signUp > returns mapped user for first-time signups with identities
SupabaseAuthRepository > signUp > throws user_already_exists when signup response is obfuscated (identities empty)
SupabaseAuthRepository > signUp > normalizes explicit duplicate errors to user_already_exists
SupabaseAuthRepository > signUp > normalizes duplicate-email message fallback to user_already_exists
ForgotPasswordForm > Valid email > calls requestPasswordReset and shows success toast
ForgotPasswordForm > Valid email > shows success toast even when requestPasswordReset throws
ForgotPasswordForm > Invalid email > does not call requestPasswordReset when email is invalid
ForgotPasswordForm > Empty email > does not call requestPasswordReset when email is empty
ResetPasswordForm > Valid password > calls updatePassword, shows success toast, and redirects to login
ResetPasswordForm > Weak password > does not call updatePassword when password is too short
ResetPasswordForm > Weak password > does not call updatePassword when passwords do not match
ResetPasswordForm > updatePassword failure > shows error toast and does not redirect when updatePassword throws
SignInForm > Successful sign-in > shows success toast and redirects when signIn succeeds
SignInForm > Invalid credentials > shows error toast and does not redirect when signIn throws invalid_login_credentials
SignInForm > Email not confirmed > shows error toast and does not redirect when signIn throws email_not_confirmed
SignInForm > Unexpected error > shows error toast and does not redirect when signIn throws generic error
SignInForm > Validation failures > does not call signIn when email is invalid
SignInForm > Validation failures > does not call signIn when password is empty
SignUpForm > New user - confirmation required > shows success toast and does not attempt sign-in when signUp succeeds
SignUpForm > Existing confirmed user > shows info toast and redirects when signIn succeeds
SignUpForm > Existing unconfirmed user > shows error toast and redirects to login when signIn throws email_not_confirmed
SignUpForm > Existing unconfirmed user > shows incorrect password error and redirects to login on invalid credentials
SignUpForm > Validation failure > does not call signUp or signIn when email is invalid
SignUpForm > Validation failure > does not call signUp or signIn when passwords do not match
SignUpForm > Validation failure > does not call signUp or signIn when password does not meet requirements
SignUpForm > SignUp failure > shows error toast and does not call signIn when signUp throws
